IndexPage.title: Tire Recycling UA
IndexPage.title-text-one: Saving nature, tire by tire. We are your reliable partner in recycling used tires in Ukraine. Over 210,000 tons of used tires pollute our country every year, and we strive to reduce this number by recycling every tire to protect and restore our ecology. Together, we can create a clean and green future for Ukraine.
IndexPage.title-text-two: Our products are ideal for creating rubber products, durable rubber flooring, pavers, rubberized asphalt, playground safety surfaces, functional landscape mulch, and shock-absorbing sports surfaces.
IndexPage.dtires-text: Give your business and home a greener future with our tire recycling services. We offer easy and convenient solutions for businesses and individuals. Get rid of your worn tires: Click below to fill out the form, and one of our experts will contact you.

our-products.title: Our products
our-products.title-description: Our recycled tire products offer exceptional quality and durability. By harnessing the robust properties of recycled rubber, we ensure superior reliability in every product we sell.
our-products.crumb-rubber-description: Crumb rubber is ideal for various applications, offering durability and versatility for creating high-quality rubber products, flooring, and more. Perfect for both industrial and consumer uses, our crumb rubber ensures lasting performance and reliability.
our-products.rubber-mulch-description: Our eco-friendly rubber mulch is perfect for landscaping, as it enhances garden aesthetics, retains moisture, and prevents weed growth. Made from recycled tires, it’s a sustainable choice for maintaining beautiful and healthy landscapes.
our-products.metal-cord-description: Our metal cord is sourced from recycled tires and used in various industrial applications.
our-products.textile-cord-description: Textile cord is sourced from recycled tires.
our-products.onboard-ring-description: Onboard ring is sourced from recycled tires.
our-products.product-name-description: Rubber products, made from crumb rubber and rubber mulch, can be created from recycled tires. These sustainable materials provide efficient and customizable solutions for various applications.

IndexPage.title-two-description: Tire Recycling UA is at the forefront of eco-friendly tire recycling. Our advanced methods and innovative technologies turn old tires into valuable products, significantly reducing waste and supporting sustainable practices. Recycling over 210,000 tons of tires annually, we are dedicated to creating a greener planet.
IndexPage.title-two-description-two: Join our mission for a sustainable future. Embrace recycled tire products and make a lasting environmental impact.
IndexPage.email-description: Stay up to date with the roadmap progress, announcements and exclusive discounts feel free to sign up with your email.
IndexPage.email-subscribe-description: Stay informed about the latest in tire recycling innovations and company news. Subscribe with your email to receive updates on our progress and announcements

AboutUsPage.about-description: At Tire Recycling UA, we transform an environmental problem into a sustainable solution. With Ukraine generating 210,000 tons of waste tires annually, our mission is to increase recycling rates from the current 7,000 tons and promote environmentally responsible practices. As the market leader in Ukraine, we recycle over 15,000 tons of tires per year, helping to prevent pollution and reduce waste. Through investments in advanced technology and capacity expansion, we are committed to continually increasing our recycling capabilities.
AboutUsPage.stat-description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Ratione dolores laborum labore provident impedit esse recusandae facere libero harum sequi.
AboutUsPage.our-history-description: Faced with the challenge of worn tires, we, as tire manufacturers in Ukraine, sought effective disposal solutions. In 2019, we pioneered an eco-friendly process to recycle tires into valuable secondary raw materials. Since 2021, we have been committed to reintegrating used tires into the production cycle, ensuring minimal environmental impact.
AboutUsPage.our-goals-description: We continuously expand our recycling efforts, enhancing rubber reuse capabilities each year. Our strategic plan involves launching new processing plants across Ukraine, making recycling accessible nationwide. By partnering with local authorities and communities, we aim to develop a comprehensive network of tire collection points. This initiative encourages daily tire disposal practices, supported by public organizations and active citizens, ultimately protecting the environment.
AboutUsPage.our-team-description: Our team consists of engineers and environmentalists with extensive knowledge of the tire industry. We are bolstered by experienced specialists who bring innovative approaches to our work. We value teamwork and uphold the highest standards in all our endeavors. Together, our professionals form the backbone of our company, driving the development of sustainable tire recycling solutions that benefit both society and the environment.
AboutUsPage.what-we-do-description: We accept used tires from both businesses and individuals, with no quantity restrictions. These tires are processed into valuable rubber granules, which are extensively used in producing various rubber products. Soon, we will expand our network of tire collection points to facilitate recycling throughout Ukraine.
AboutUsPage.applications-title-description: Recycled tires are transformed into valuable raw materials used in various industries, forming the basis for numerous rubber products, flooring, and more. Crumb rubber enhances the performance of rubberized asphalt and is widely used in safe, durable playgrounds, moisture-retaining landscape mulch, and shock-absorbing sports facility coatings.
AboutUsPage.item-one-description: Versatile rubber items made from recycled tires, ensuring durability and sustainability.
AboutUsPage.item-two-description: Safe, durable surfaces made from crumb rubber, providing cushioning and injury prevention.
AboutUsPage.item-three-description: Eco-friendly mulch that retains moisture, prevents weed growth, and enhances landscaping.
AboutUsPage.item-four-description: Enhanced asphalt with crumb rubber, offering superior performance and longevity.
AboutUsPage.item-five-description: Shock-absorbing surfaces for sports facilities, improving safety and comfort for athletes.
AboutUsPage.item-six-description: Durable mats for various applications, offering slip resistance and comfort.
AboutUsPage.item-seven-description: Interlocking tiles made from recycled rubber, ideal for gyms, play areas, and more.
AboutUsPage.item-eight-description: Specialized surfaces for football fields, ensuring player safety and field durability.
AboutUsPage.item-nine-description: Durable barriers made from recycled rubber, used for safety and traffic control.

CrumbRubberPage.crumb-rubber-title: Crumb Rubber - High Quality Rubber Granules
CrumbRubberPage.crumb-rubber-description-one: Our crumb rubber, produced from recycled tires, is a versatile and sustainable product perfect for a wide range of industrial applications. With particle sizes as small as 0.55 mm, our high-quality rubber granules are ideal for creating safe sports surfaces, effective sound isolation materials, and durable road surface elements. Our production process adheres to the strictest quality and environmental standards, ensuring reliability and sustainability for your projects.
CrumbRubberPage.crumb-rubber-description-two: Explore the benefits of our high-quality crumb rubber. With particle sizes down to 0.55 mm, our rubber granules are suitable for various industrial and commercial applications, providing unmatched durability and performance.
CrumbRubberPage.rubberized-asphalt-description: Rubberized asphalt concrete is an innovative road surface material that combines standard asphalt with recycled tire rubber granules. These granules, making up 15% to 22% of the road mixture, enhance the elasticity and weather resistance of asphalt. This proven technology has been used for over four decades and does not require specialized equipment for installation, making it as convenient as traditional asphalt mixtures while offering superior performance.
CrumbRubberPage.sport-coverings-description: Sports surfaces made from rubber granules provide safe and comfortable fields for athletes. These surfaces offer excellent shock absorption, reducing the risk of injury, and provide superior grip for various sports, including athletics, football, and basketball. Resistant to changing weather conditions and easy to maintain, rubber granule sports surfaces are a cost-effective choice for sports facilities.
CrumbRubberPage.contact-description-one: We provide top-quality rubber granules in the market, ensuring exceptional performance for your projects. Whether you're looking to enhance sports surfaces, road durability, or sound insulation, our crumb rubber offers the best solution.

RubberMulchPage.rubber-mulch-description-one: Using rubber mulch made from recycled tires is an eco-friendly and innovative solution for landscaping, children's playgrounds, and sports fields. This material not only fulfills all the functions of traditional wood mulch but also surpasses it by providing superior durability, safety, and low maintenance. Rubber mulch is highly weather-resistant, does not attract pests, and retains its color for many years, making it an ideal choice for any landscaping project.
RubberMulchPage.rubber-mulch-description-two: We offer high-quality rubber mulch suitable for a wide range of applications.
RubberMulchPage.applications-title-description: Recycled tires are transformed into valuable raw materials used across various industries. These raw materials form the basis for producing a variety of rubber products, flooring, and more. Rubberized asphalt, created using crumb rubber, offers enhanced performance characteristics. Recycled tire materials are also widely used in creating safe and durable playgrounds and as landscape mulch to retain moisture and prevent weed growth. In sports facilities, they serve as shock-absorbing surfaces that increase the safety and comfort of athletes.
RubberMulchPage.item-one-description: High-quality rubber products made from recycled materials, ensuring durability and sustainability.
RubberMulchPage.item-two-description: Safe, durable surfaces for playgrounds made from rubber mulch, providing cushioning and injury prevention.
RubberMulchPage.item-three-description: Eco-friendly rubber mulch for landscaping, offering long-lasting color and minimal maintenance.
RubberMulchPage.item-four-description: Enhanced asphalt with rubber, providing superior performance and longevity.
RubberMulchPage.item-five-description: Durable sports surfaces made from rubber for improved safety and comfort.
RubberMulchPage.item-six-description: Versatile rubber mats for various applications, offering slip resistance and comfort.
RubberMulchPage.item-seven-description: Interlocking rubber tiles ideal for gyms, play areas, and more.
RubberMulchPage.item-eight-description: Specialized surfaces for football fields, ensuring player safety and field durability.
RubberMulchPage.item-nine-description: Durable rubber barriers for safety and traffic control.
RubberMulchPage.house-landscape-description: Rubber mulch is an environmentally sustainable alternative to wood mulch, offering improved durability and wind resistance due to its weight. This material effectively channels rainwater to plant roots without retaining it and does not attract termites, making it safe for landscaping. Investing in rubber mulch means long-term beauty for your garden: it does not require annual replacement and retains its vibrant color for a decade, unlike wood mulch, which quickly deteriorates when exposed to the elements.
RubberMulchPage.coating-description: Rubber playground mulch provides a safe, durable surface designed to offer maximum protection and comfort. Made from recycled tires, this material is an excellent choice for any play area due to its impact-absorbing properties that reduce the risk of injury from falls.
RubberMulchPage.contact-description-one: We provide top-quality rubber mulch on the market, ensuring exceptional performance for your projects. Whether you're enhancing playgrounds, landscaping, or sports facilities, our rubber mulch offers the best solution.

MetalCordPage.metal-cord-description: Metal cord, a steel wire used to reinforce tires, provides them with structural integrity. Once a tire reaches the end of its life cycle, this metal cord is recovered through recycling. It can then be reused or melted down to create new steel products. Metal cord is a highly valuable recycling material because steel is easily recyclable and has a broad range of applications across various industries, from construction to the production of new metal products.
MetalCordPage.contact-description-one: We offer top-quality metal cord and other recycling materials on the market. Our products meet the highest standards, ensuring exceptional performance and reliability for your industrial needs.

BeadRingPage.bead-ring-description: The bead ring is a crucial reinforced component of a tire that ensures it remains securely fixed on the wheel rim. When a tire reaches the end of its life cycle, the bead ring is removed during recycling and can be repurposed into new products such as O-rings and protective rims. This makes the bead ring a valuable resource in the recycling industry, as it contains high-quality materials that support sustainable production and waste reduction.
BeadRingPage.contact-description-one: We offer top-quality bead rings and other recycled materials on the market. Our products adhere to the highest standards, ensuring exceptional performance and reliability for your industrial applications.

TextileCordPage.bead-ring-description: Textile cord is a fibrous material that is an integral part of the tire carcass, providing strength and flexibility. After a tire has worn out, the textile cord can be separated and used as a secondary raw material in various industries. It is useful in construction for reinforcing mortars, in the production of nonwovens, and as filler for car mats and seats. Recycling textile cord helps reduce waste and supports sustainable manufacturing practices.
TextileCordPage.contact-description-one: We offer top-quality textile cord and other recycled materials on the market. Our products meet the highest standards, ensuring exceptional performance and reliability for your industrial applications.

DisposeTiresPage.dispose-tires-description: Do you have used tires that you need to dispose of? Please complete this form, and we will assist you in the process. Tire proccesing plant is located in Dnipro.

form.tire-type-inside: What type of tires do you have? (Passenger tire, truck tire, etc.)
form.tire-quantity-up: How many tires do you have?
form.delivery-up: Do you have a vehicle to deliver the tires to the collection point?
form.additional-comments-inside: Type here if you have any additional questions or comments
